about_the_game:
Welcome to a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by a horde of hungry zombies! In 'Have a Good Day', you will embark on an exciting survival adventure where every decision counts.

Your objective is simple but challenging: survive. To achieve this, you will have to explore the ruins of a devastated city, in search of vital resources to stay alive. But it won't be as easy as it seems, since time is against you. Each house you explore will have a set amount of time to check it before the zombie horde catches up with you.

Delve into abandoned houses, searching every corner for essential supplies such as food, medicine and weapons, but always with an eye on the clock. As time progresses, the zombies will get closer and closer, increasing the tension and danger with each passing second.

Time is your enemy, as each passing day brings with it new threats and challenges. Do you have what it takes to survive in a world infested with the undead? Can you find enough resources to resist the constant zombie siege before time runs out?

Prepare for an intense and suspenseful experience, where every decision you make could be the difference between life and death. Join the fight for survival in 'Have a Good Day'!
